Class WarGame

java.lang.Object
  WarGame

public class WarGame
extends Object

War class simulates a game of war between two players

Constructor Summary
WarGame()
          Default constructor deals equal amount of cards to both players
 
Method Summary
 Card getP1Card()
          getP1Card returns the Card object associated with the card that player 1 played
 int getP1Hand()
          getP1Hand method returns the amount of cards in player 1's hand
 int getP1Winnings()
          getP1Winnings method returns the amount of cards in player 1's winnings pile
 Card getP2Card()
          getP2Card returns the Card object associated with the card that player 2 player
 int getP2Hand()
          getP2Hand method returns the amount of cards in player 2's hand
 int getP2Winnings()
          getP2Winnings method returns the amount of cards in player 2's winnings pile
 void handShuffle()
          handSwitch method shuffles the player's winnings hand and makes it the players hand
 void playRound()
          playRound method each player plays one round of cards.
 void war()
          War method plays one card face down from each player and adds them to the cards in play
 boolean warStatus()
          warStatus method returns whether or not the game is currently in war
 int winner()
          winner method returns the integer associated with the player who won
